draughts.model

Class FEN

  • java.lang.Object
    • draughts.model.FEN

  • public class FEN
extends java.lang.Object
    part of the MODEL component in a MVC pattern for this application

    FEN class.
    The Forsyth-Edwards Notation or shortly FEN tag defines a position on the board. pdn.fmjd.org - FEN Tag. The following grammar describes the formal syntax of the value of a FEN tag. 

     // Productions
 Fen                        : COLOR (NumericSquares | AlphaNumericSquares) DOT?
 NumericSquares             : (COLON COLOR NumericSquareSequence)+
 NumericSquareSequence      : NumericSquareRange (COMMA NumericSquareRange)*
 NumericSquareRange         : KING? NUMSQUARE (HYPHEN NUMSQUARE)?
 AlphaNumericSquares        : (COLON COLOR AlphaNumericSquareSequence)+
 AlphaNumericSquareSequence : KING? ALPHASQUARE (COMMA KING? ALPHASQUARE)*
 
 // Tokens
 COLOR                      : "[WB?]"
 KING                       : "K"
 ALPHASQUARE                : "[a-h][1-8]"
 NUMSQUARE                  : "([1-9][0-9]*)|(0[1-9][0-9]*)|0"
 HYPHEN                     : "\-"
 COMMA                      : "\,"
 COLON                      : "\:"
 DOT                        : "\."
